entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023
